name: That Was 2022 - An Aviation Short Film
description:
Hi everyone, and happy new year! If you’ve been following the channel for a while now, you’ll know I try to make a special video like this at the end of every year.

2022 was a fantastic year for the channel, ending up with over 70,000 subscribers, and it’s thanks to every single one of you who continue to watch me cram myself into airplanes!

There are a few more videos I filmed last year that I’m still working on, so there’s plenty of interesting stuff on the way, and some really exciting flights happening this year.

So, with this one last look back at 2022, I just wanted to say, thank you so much for your continued support, and I hope you enjoy.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
